name: [mechajam 2] mecha puncher
description:
Welcome to Oo° MechaPuncheR °oO 

it is vector simple, but it moves super well,

and in style ! 

Come and try to beat its 10 screens of challenge to the right,

Oo_ Destroy the Core! _oO

let and right to walk 

up and down to jet

space to dash punch 

!dash punch needs recharge! 

go to the last scene

destroy the core 

space to start
